column5: This 4-BR, 3-BA Waterfront Townhome in Point Venture featuring 3 Lakeside Decks and a Private Boat Dock on beautiful Lake Travis is the ideal retreat for a family and friends. Comfortably sleeps 10 in 3 master suites with queen beds, 1 bedroom has a full size bed and a bunk bed. An inviting decor created to complement lakeside living and family fun!
column8: Enjoy Lake Travis with a Private Boat Dock!
